msbt.message: Yo, ! Thanks again for inviting me here.Yep, thanks to you, I made my big debut today.I think I'm gonna be a big star here, but first I've got some unpacking to do, so I'll see you around.
Oh, ! Glad to see you. The Express has arrived on ! It's a very messy train that needs to do some unpacking right now, so I'll have to catch you later.

Hey, so, I did some real thinking about what we talked about before. And you're right! I should totally live here on this island with you and your friends. SoI'm here! And I'm gonna start living that island life rightnow!
Oh, hey there, ! I've gotta say thanks again for inviting me to this place. The sand is soft, the are juicy, and the livin' is large!Can't wait to make the most of it with you, .

Hey, ! You know, I couldn't stop thinking about our conversation the other day. I mean, you personally invited me to move here. So how could I not make it happen?! Anyway, now that I'm a fellow resident, let's get after it!
Ayy, look who it is! Just the person I was thinking about! The Big ! None other than !I really appreciate you talking me into moving here. It's been great so far. See you around, neighbor!

Whoa, if it isn't my old pal ! Long time no see, huh? Guess what.<10_4 /> I did end up moving here, just like you suggested!Can't believe we've been missing each other like this—I actually moved here a while ago. But hey! We're both here now! Let's do some sometime, eh? !

Oh It's you, Ugh, I can't believe you're seeing me like this. But that's alright, I can pull it together. Let's see Yeah! in the h-h-h-h <10_10 />HACHOO!<10_9 />house.Ugh, forget it. Let's meet up later when I'm not falling apart.
Hey, ! It's me, !You know , right? Well, they're the one who talked me into moving here. That's right—as of today, we're both officially residents! Cool, right?

Hey, you're , right? I think we met before.It's funny, I think I got headhunted by your friend .Yep, someone decided that could use more , so here I am! Looking forward to getting more face time with you once I get everything unpacked, .

Heya, ! We meet again, it seems.You know, first sold me on , but the place really sells itself. The fun, the sun, the abundant What's not to love?Anyway, now that we're both locals, feel free to stop by anytime!
We've met before, haven't we? Well, in any case, you probably haven't heard THIS I'm an official , !Yep, finally talked me into permanently bringing the show here.
Hey, do you remember a certain , formerly of ? Wellat 's request, he's now of ! And, as usual, I'm talking about myself. Looking forward to seeing you around more often!

Ah, , right? Yeah, you go way back with , don't you? Believe it or not, convinced me to move back here becau—becauuuu—becauuuuugh<10_7 arg="30" /> <10_10 />HA-CHOO!<10_9 />Ugh, sorry about that. Turns out I'm allergic to moving. Let's catch up another time, OK?

Heya! You remember me, right? It's me, !So, I was summoned to this island to lend the place my patented charm. Butthe person who invited me hasn't, um, been around much lately, so Anyway, I'm glad you're here, . Together we can make the best!

So, get a load of this. A certain person, who shall remain nameless, invited me hereand then left! I'm actually impressed. It's a social power move that I'm going to have to add to my arsenal. Anyway, now that I'm here, I'm going to try to make the most of it, !

Yo, ! You haven't seen a certain someone around here lately, have you? A certain someone who INVITED me to move here and then straight- up moved away before I arrived? Ah, right. I haven't named a name yet. I suppose I shouldn't.But bottling up my feelings makes me muh—me—muhhhhhh <10_10 />MAHHH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Ugh, sorry. It makes me sneezy. Why don't you come back later after I've sneezed out all my snark?
Yo, ! Surprised to see me? The prodigal returns, right? I just missed it here, you know? The views, the news, on the shore Well, now that I'm back, let's fire it all up again, !

Hey, remember me? We both used to live here on together. I'm ! I ended up moving to another island for a bit. It was nice and all, but it was no . SoI'm back! What do we do first? , or spend some time ?

Ah, ! It's you, isn't it? Well, you remember me, don't you? It's ! That's right, I'm back on and I'm ready for a—ahhh— <10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />Ugh, sorry about that. I was going to say I'm ready for a party, but it's not true. Maybe another time.
Are you the one they call around here?Ha HA! I'm just using my serious tone to mess with you. Classic , ! I'm just making the rounds, showing off my dance moves.

Hey, we meet again! Remember me? It's , of course!I know I'm a little late making a round of introductions, but I'm Team now. Funny how life works, eh? Us meeting up again here. Well, let's make the most of it, shall we?
So, I bet I know what you're thinking. What's this guy doing here again, right? Ha HA! That is a good question.And the answer isthat I'm 's newest ! Looking forward to seeing you around the island!
So you're from , right? And you don't remember me?Guess I didn't make a big enough impression the first time when we met on Well, I won't make that mistake again. I'm ! That's right THE !

Hey, . Good to see yo—yaa—<10_10 />YAH-CHOOOO!<10_9 />Ugh I can't even pretend I'm OK right now.Look, long story short, we know each other, I moved back here, yadda, yadda, yadda. Let's do the whole reunion thing another time when I'm feeling better, OK?
Yo, ! Thanks again for inviting me here.Yep, thanks to you, I made my big debut today.I think I'm gonna be a big star here, but first I've got some unpacking to do, so I'll see you around.
Oh, ! Glad to see you. The Express has arrived on ! It's a very messy train that needs to do some unpacking right now, so I'll have to catch you later.

Hey, so, I did some real thinking about what we talked about before. And you're right! I should totally live here on this island with you and your friends. SoI'm here! And I'm gonna start living that island life rightnow!
Yo! Just gotta say thanks again for giving me the download on a while back. This place is cooler than on a night, . Looking forward to more pro tips from you in the future, .
Hey, remember when we met up on another island and you invited me to live here? Well! Here I am!I've spent a few days just meditating and rethinking my life's purpose, but now I'm ready to mingle.
Hey, thanks for the sweet reference, .To think, if we hadn't met on that other islandI might never have made my way here. And now I'm basically a local. I can even tell you where to get the best on .

Long time no see, amigo! That's French for !Anyway, do you remember the pact we made on that other island? Maybe it was more of an oath Doesn't matter. The upshot is that I'm here now. I live on , ! I wanted to tell you in person, perhaps in the form of an interpretive dance or poem But this will have to do. I'll be seeing you around!

Oh, it's good that you're here, I've been meaning to say thanks for inviting me here that one time.See, I'm like an endangered butterfly who requires designer pollen to live And this place, this islaaaaAHHHH—<10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />Ugh I'll have to resume this touching analogy when my nose stops trying sneeze my head off
Yo, ! Thanks again for inviting me here.Yep, thanks to you, I made my big debut today.I think I'm gonna be a big star here, but first I've got some unpacking to do, so I'll see you around.
Oh, ! Glad to see you. The Express has arrived on ! It's a very messy train that needs to do some unpacking right now, so I'll have to catch you later.

Hey, so, I did some real thinking about what we talked about before. And you're right! I should totally live here on this island with you and your friends. SoI'm here! And I'm gonna start living that island life rightnow!

Who could have imagined that a little camping would lead to thisYou remember, right? Inviting me to move here when we were hanging out at the campsite? Well, so far, totally delivers.This place is paradise! And it's not overcrowded with wannabe chefs yet. I'm the first one!

Hey, ! As promised, I'm now an official resident of . The move itself was actually quite dramatic. There was laughter. There were tears I almost didn't go through with it! But you only live once, you know? That's English for carpe diem!

I'm so glad we ran into each other at the campsite the other day.Because I don't know if I would have ever discovered this place on my own, you know? I think this officially makes you an influencer, . Ha HA!

Whoa, look who's here! If it isn't ! Glad we finally connected again. There's been a major plot twist in the new season of I live here now! It's all because of that conversation we had back at the campsite, believe it or not. I was worried the show was gonna get canceled before I even had a chance to tell you. Ha HA! Kidding. I already signed a merch deal. Two words— -branded apparel.

Ugh Remember whencamping? TalkedmovingislandForget it. I'm too sick to do a full performance right now.Thanks for inviting me to move here. I did it and now I'm sick as aahhhhhahhhhh <10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />Yeah. Let's talk later, OK?

Heya! I'm camper extraordinaire.Actually, don't call me that. And forget I ever said it.Let's talk about instead—the one who invited me to move here when I was camping. That's right, . As of now, we're both locals!

Hey You're that I met a while ago, aren't you?When we were glamping, remember? I brought my own and you laughed at me? Anyway, I got recruited to live here on full-time. It's a big "get" for . Let's sync up for more face time later, after I finish up all of this cardboard-box time.

Ah, we meet again! I used to camp here, you know. The name's , remember? I'll admit it—I bought the package that was selling.What's not to love? A whole island with -brand exclusivity? Sign me up! So yeah, I live here full-time now. I'll be seeing you around, !

We met before, right? When we were camping?It's hard to remember—it's all a blur of flannel and roasted marshmallows in my mind Anyway, I ended up getting an invite to move here permanently from ! See you around, !

If I were to say the name , what would that mean to you? Ha HA! It's MY name. You remember me, right? I hope?!Either way, it's my pleasure to inform you that invited me to move here! I hope we'll be seeing each other around all the time, .

Oh, Sorry, I'm happy to see you, it's just that I'm aahhhahhhhhh <10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 />I was gonna say I'm a bit under the weather.Let's catch up soon. I've got some juicy gossip that I'm dying to share.

Heya! You remember me, right? It's me, !So, I was summoned to this island to lend the place my patented charm. Butthe person who invited me hasn't, um, been around much lately, so Anyway, I'm glad you're here, . Together we can make the best!

So, get a load of this. A certain person, who shall remain nameless, invited me hereand then left! I'm actually impressed. It's a social power move that I'm going to have to add to my arsenal. Anyway, now that I'm here, I'm going to try to make the most of it, !

Yo, ! I haven't seen you since I was camping on this . How goes it? You haven't seen a certain someone around here lately, have you?A certain someone who INVITED me to move here and then straight- up moved away before I arrived? Ah, right. I haven't named a name yet. I suppose I shouldn't.But bottling up my feelings makes me ma— Mah— Mahhhhhh <10_10 />MAHHH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Ugh, sorry. It makes me sneezy. Why don't you come back later after I've sneezed out all my snark?

There you are, ! I've been looking all over for you.It feels like yesterday I was visiting the campsite and you asked if I wanted to live here. Who knew that conversation would set off a chain of events that could only lead to me actually moving? You heard me! I'm now an official resident of !You're not having second thoughts, are you?

Well, look who the dragged in, !Nah, I knew you'd show up eventually, .I want you to know that the convo we had back when we met at the campsite really stuck with me. Well, can't remember exactly what you said, but whatever it was got me to move to this . And so far, it feels meant to be!

Welcome to my humble abode, ! Believe it or not, you're kinda the guest of honor. The only reason I'm here is because of what you said to me back at the campsite, . Plus, it's a great opportunity to expand my name recognition. Fame is such hard work.

There you are, ! Wait... You didn't forget about me did you, ? Remember? We were chatting It was at the campsite You asked me to move to here! Eh, I guess it doesn't really matter. 'Cause I LOVE living here on , ! Anyway, I hope you'll swing by my chalet sometime soon so we can reacquaint ourselves.

Hey, ! Welcome to Casa de .When you first invited me to move to this back at the campsite, I was pretty skeptical. But now that I'm here, I can't imagine living anywhere else!And best part about me moving? Now you can visit me anytime you want, !

Oh! Is that you, ? Of course it is! I'd recognize you anywhere, . I bet you're wondering what THE is doing here I moved here! After we chatted at the campsite on this , I couldn't stop thinking about . So I packed up my high-end collection and voilà!Let's get together soon and I'll tell you all about my other interests!

Hello, hello! What a pleasure to see you, !Ha! Are you having flashbacks to the last time you saw me? Back at the campsite, ? I admit I was flattered when you invited me to live out here as your neighbor on . I bet you never thought this big-city would give it all up for the quiet life You don't think I made a horrible mistake, do you?

Is it just my cold meds or is that ? I met you at the campsite, remember? You suggested I take a leap and move here permanently.You probably don't recognize me under all this snosnoo<10_10 />SNOT-CHOO!<10_9 />I should probably get back to bed. Maybe I'll hit you up when I'm feeling better, .

Remember me, ? I can see you're surprised there's such a posh around here. To be honest, so am I! But back at the campsite, convinced me to go for it! As fellow residents, I hope we'll be seeing a lot of each other!

Well, if it isn't . Remember me? ? We met at the campsite It'll come to you eventually. Anyway, invited me to move to this and I said yes! It was all very exciting. Speaking of exciting stuff, we should hang out sometime, !

Oh, ! It's I think I met you at the campsite. made a strong case for me moving to this So I threw caution to the wind and went for it, !Now while I have you Where's the best place to get headshots taken around here?

What up, ?<10_4 /> Yes, it's me—.Have you seen around lately? We met back when I was visiting the campsite. 's passion for this island is actually why I decided to move here!I wanted to thank them, but I guess I'll just thank you instead.<10_4 /> Thanks, !

Oh, . Where have you been, ? I haven't seen you since I moved here. I just assumed you were participating in some sort of high-stakes reality competition. I met at the campsite, and they couldn't stop raving about . That's when I decided to move here, you know, before it became "cool." That was a while back now. Anyway, great to see you again!

Are you? We met at the campsite, rightBack then, invited me to come live on this island.Just my luck that this cold is ruining our much-anticipated reunion Ha<10_10 />HA-CHOO!<10_9 />Whatever I've got is bad news, so you better keep your distance.Let's chat again when I'm not soaked in phlegm,

Oh, ! It's me, !I'm looking for someone I met at the campsite a while back. We really jived, ! So much so in fact that they convinced me to move here. I just started unpacking today! Thing isI can't remember their name. Or what they looked like.But if you run into them, tell 'em I say, "Hi, !"

How goes it, ? It's me, .I bet you're wondering what I'm doing here, huh?It was all pretty random. I ran into someone at the campsite who suggested I move here. That someone doesn't live here anymore. But don't worry, I do!Don't be a stranger, OK?

Hi, ! Fancy seeing me here, right?I was staying at the campsite here when someone recruited me to live on full-time. I assume they were a talent scout or something like that, .The move went OK, except I caught this cold somehow in thethe<10_10 />EE-CHOO!Mind if we finish this conversation later? Everything's starting to go fuzzy. That can't be good
